description: Provides block protection for your server.

permissions.description: Gives access to all CoreProtect actions and commands
permissions.name: coreprotect.*

permissions.description: Has permission to use the lookup command
permissions.name: coreprotect.lookup

permissions.description: Has permission to lookup chat messages
permissions.name: coreprotect.lookup.chat

permissions.description: Has permission to lookup player commands
permissions.name: coreprotect.lookup.command

permissions.description: Has permission to lookup player sessions
permissions.name: coreprotect.lookup.session

permissions.description: Has permission to lookup player username changes
permissions.name: coreprotect.lookup.username

permissions.description: Has permission to lookup block data
permissions.name: coreprotect.lookup.block

permissions.description: Has permission to lookup player interactions
permissions.name: coreprotect.lookup.click

permissions.description: Has permission to lookup entity kills
permissions.name: coreprotect.lookup.container

permissions.description: Has permission to use the inspector
permissions.name: coreprotect.inspect

permissions.description: Has permission to use the help command
permissions.name: coreprotect.help

permissions.description: Has permission to use the purge command
permissions.name: coreprotect.purge

permissions.description: Has permission to use the reload command
permissions.name: coreprotect.reload
